metadata.inclusion: In the Add new device section of the O2 Smart Box smartphone app, select the device type to activate inclusion mode.
metadata.exclusion: In the device details of the O2 Smart Box smartphone app, select "Unpair device" to enter exclusion mode and follow the displayed instructions.
metadata.reset: Select Factory Reset from the Advanced drop-down menu in the WebUI or from the settings section in the O2 Smart Box app.
